title: Where is my phone? (for wear)
summary: Open the app on your wear and make your handheld ring and vibrate!
developerAddress:
C/ Pujades 126
22@Barcelona: Innovation District
08018 Barcelona - Catalunya
description: Can't find your phone? Just open Where is my phone on your wear smartwatch and make your handheld ring and vibrate! You'll easily find it!Do not forget your phone anymore, your wear smartwatch will vibrate when it loses connection with your phone.
descriptionHTML:
Can't find your phone? Just open Where is my phone on your wear smartwatch and make your handheld ring and vibrate! You'll easily find it!

Do not forget your phone anymore, your wear smartwatch will vibrate when it loses connection with your phone.
